mapper.select: SELECT QPS.PITM_CD , QPS.PITM_SPEC_IDX , QPS.PITM_VER , QPS.AITM_SPEC_IDX , QPSA.AITM_SEQ , QPSA.ANS_DPT_CD , QPSA.ISP_DUR_TM , QPSA.EQM_USE_TM , QPSA.AMITM_CD , (SELECT VRIA_KN FROM MS_AMITM MA WHERE MA.AMITM_CD = QPSA.AMITM_CD) AS VRIA_KN , (SELECT VRIA_NO FROM MS_AMITM MA WHERE MA.AMITM_CD = QPSA.AMITM_CD) AS VRIA_NO , (SELECT AITM_KN FROM MS_AITM WHERE AITM_CD = (SELECT AITM_CD FROM MS_AMITM MA WHERE MA.AMITM_CD = QPSA.AMITM_CD)) AS AITM_KN , QPSA.AITM_ORD , QPSA.PERSPEC_TXT , QPSA.OWC_SPEC_TXT , QPSA.SPEC_TXT_EN , QPSA.PER_SLV_LOW , QPSA.PER_SLV_UPP , QPSA.PER_SLV_DESC , QPSA.OWC_SLV_LOW , QPSA.OWC_SLV_UPP , QPSA.OWC_SLV_DESC , QPSA.RST_DPNT , QPSA.RPT_PRT_SLV_VAL , QPSA.RPT_PRT_ITM_NM , QPSA.MKR_QTY , QPSA.AITM_RMK , QPAS.AITM_SPEC_VER , DECODE(QPSA.RPT_PRT_YN, 'Y', '출력함', '출력안함') AS RPT_PRT_YN , (SELECT DTL_NM FROM SY_CD_DTL SCD WHERE SCD.DTL_CD = QPSA.SPEC_TYP) AS SPEC_TYP_NM , (SELECT DTL_NM FROM SY_CD_DTL SCD WHERE SCD.DTL_CD = QPSA.JDG_TYP) AS JDG_TYP_NM , (SELECT DTL_NM FROM SY_CD_DTL SCD WHERE SCD.DTL_CD = QPSA.SLV_JDG_CFM AND SCD.PLNT_CD = QPS.PLNT_CD) AS SLV_JDG_CFM_NM , (SELECT DTL_NM FROM SY_CD_DTL SCD WHERE SCD.DTL_CD = QPSA.SLV_JDG_NON_CFM AND SCD.PLNT_CD = QPS.PLNT_CD) AS SLV_JDG_NON_CFM_NM , (SELECT DTL_NM FROM SY_CD_DTL SCD WHERE SCD.DTL_CD = QPSA.RST_UNIT_CD AND SCD.PLNT_CD = QPS.PLNT_CD) AS RST_UNIT_NM , (SELECT DPT_NM FROM SY_DPT SD WHERE SD.DPT_CD = QPSA.ANS_DPT_CD AND SD.PLNT_CD = QPS.PLNT_CD) AS ANS_DPT_NM FROM QM_PITM_SPEC QPS LEFT JOIN QM_PITM_SPEC_AITM QPSA ON QPS.AITM_SPEC_IDX = QPSA.AITM_SPEC_IDX AND QPS.PLNT_CD = QPSA.PLNT_CD LEFT JOIN QM_PITM_AITM_SPEC QPAS ON QPS.AITM_SPEC_IDX = QPAS.AITM_SPEC_IDX AND QPS.PLNT_CD = QPAS.PLNT_CD WHERE QPS.PLNT_CD = #{plntCd} AND QPS.PITM_CD = #{pitmCd} AND QPS.PITM_VER = #{pitmVer} AND QPS.AITM_SPEC_IDX = #{aitmSpecIdx} ORDER BY QPSA.AITM_ORD
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QT_PITM_ANS_INFO ( PLNT_CD , ANS_IDX , CRG_DPT_CD , SPCM_NO , CLLT_MTD , CLLT_MCN , CLLT_PLA , SMP_STRG_MTD , SMP_VOL_UNIT , SMP_VOL_ANS , SMP_VOL_ETC , SMP_VOL_MNG , ANS_NEW_YN , MIC_YN , EMG_YN , PKG_MTR_SPEC , RMTR_SPEC , RMTR_CFMUL , QDRUG_YN ) SELECT #{plntCd} , #{ansIdx} , CRG_DPT_CD , SPCM_NO , CLLT_MTD , CLLT_MCN , CLLT_PLA , SMP_STRG_MTD , SMP_VOL_UNIT , SMP_VOL_ANS , SMP_VOL_ETC , SMP_VOL_MNG , (SELECT DECODE(COUNT(*),0,'Y','N') FROM QT_PITM_ANS_PROC QPAP LEFT JOIN QM_PITM_SPEC QPS ON QPAP.PITM_SPEC_IDX = QPS.PITM_SPEC_IDX AND QPS.PITM_CD = #{pitmCd}) AS ANS_NEW_YN , MIC_YN , #{emgYn} , PKG_MTR_SPEC , #{rmtrSpec} , #{rmtrCfmul} , #{qdrugYn} FROM QM_PITM_INFO WHERE PLNT_CD = #{plntCd} AND PITM_CD = #{pitmCd} AND PITM_VER = #{pitmVer}

INSERT INTO QT_PITM_ANS_RST ( PLNT_CD , ANS_IDX , RST_SEQ , RST_PROC_CD , ANS_DPT_CD , AMITM_CD , AITM_ORD , PERSPEC_TXT , OWC_SPEC_TXT , SPEC_TXT_EN , SPEC_TYP , JDG_TYP , PER_SLV_LOW , PER_SLV_UPP , PER_SLV_DESC , OWC_SLV_LOW , OWC_SLV_UPP , OWC_SLV_DESC , SLV_JDG_CFM , SLV_JDG_NON_CFM , RST_UNIT_CD , RST_DPNT , RPT_PRT_SLV_VAL , RPT_PRT_ITM_NM , RPT_PRT_YN , ISP_DPT_CD , SMP_CLLT_QTY , SMP_CLLT_UNIT , ISP_DUR_TM , EQM_USE_TM ) SELECT #{plntCd} , #{ansIdx} , AITM_SEQ , 'S0140100' , ANS_DPT_CD , AMITM_CD , AITM_ORD , PERSPEC_TXT , OWC_SPEC_TXT , SPEC_TXT_EN , SPEC_TYP , JDG_TYP , PER_SLV_LOW , PER_SLV_UPP , PER_SLV_DESC , OWC_SLV_LOW , OWC_SLV_UPP , OWC_SLV_DESC , SLV_JDG_CFM , SLV_JDG_NON_CFM , RST_UNIT_CD , RST_DPNT , RPT_PRT_SLV_VAL , RPT_PRT_ITM_NM , RPT_PRT_YN , ISP_DPT_CD , SMP_CLLT_QTY , SMP_CLLT_UNIT , ISP_DUR_TM , EQM_USE_TM FROM QM_PITM_SPEC_AITM WHERE PLNT_CD = #{plntCd} AND AITM_SPEC_IDX = #{aitmSpecIdx}
